EmailTemplate.name: ProSeries-Nurture2
EmailTemplate.subject: Making the Most of Your ProSeries Evaluation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Hello – Hope you're having a good week. As you explore your ProSeries® Evaluation Software, you can feel confident knowing that we have the information and resources you'll need as a new user. See below for tips and tools designed to help you make the most of ProSeries.
Learn to Use ProSeries Experience a learning path designed for tax professionals who are new to ProSeries or looking to refresh their ProSeries knowledge. Download proficiency check lists, watch QuickStart video tutorials, and ask questions of the Intuit ProSeries community...
5 Ways to Get the Most Out of ProSeries ProSeries maintains a focus on making it easier for our customers to build their practice on their terms. As the leading accounting tax software brand on the market with more than 65,000 practices, we understand that we have to revisit and renew our commitment to provide improved products, services and support, year after year...
Have a great day, and of course let me know if you have any questions about ProSeries.
{!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.

All other marks are the property of their respective owners, should be treated as such, and may be registered in various jurisdictions.
Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
